goals__remit: WestRock is the result of a merger between RockTenn and MWV. It is a producer of corrugated and consumer packaging, container board, Kraft paper, recycled board and displays. The company has  a workforce of 45.000 worldwide, 300 operating and office locations in 30 countries, and serves customers in over 100 countries.
